reviews.review_text: This is a steal of a deal. It got to me 11 days sooner than was expected via shipping expected date. It runs about a full size small and it's not a heavy weight hoodie, but it does keep you warmer. Over all I would recommend this especially at the price point. Under $11 US is not going to be beat in my opinion. I would definitely buy this again.

reviews.title: Undersized
reviews.review_text: I normally buy a 1x in jackets. Because I wanted to wear this as a cold morning, coffee warmer, I ordered a 3x so I could wrap myself in it. I can barely zip it up! It runs a full 2 sizes too small IF it was a WOMANS jacket- this is suppose to be a MANS jacket! Really disappointed since it appears to be a well made jacket, and the fuzzy lining is exactly what I wanted. I'll keep it, but unfortunately it's not what I was looking for.

reviews.title: Made for little people
reviews.review_text: Sizes run very small. I ordered an XL and it was too small. I then ordered a 2 XL and it still fit very tight. I'm going to keep them and give them as presents. I won't order a 3rd coat. It takes about a month to get shipped. It's a very good product if you can find your size and wait for it to arrive.

reviews.title: Geo
reviews.review_text: I EMAILED THEM FOUR OR FIVE TIMES. TO DISCUSS A VERY HIGH SHIPPING CHARGE. I PURCHASED 45 OF THEM AND I RECEIVED ZERO RESPONSE SO ZERO STARS ON CUSTOMER SERVICE. OVERALL VALUE WAS GOOD FOR THE PRICE OTHERWISE. GEO

reviews.title: $10 Purchase
reviews.review_text: The zipper was on the wrong side and it was already frayed when it arrived. Size was too small even though I ordered a larger size. It's great for wearing around the house but not something I would wear elsewhere. It was less than $10 so an okay value

reviews.title: I plan to stop ordering online from Walmart.
reviews.review_text: Just inferior. I don't know what I was expecting for the price, which doubles as you add shipping and tax. I ordered a size 2x but it was way too small for me. When I tried to return it to my local Walmart store they would not accept the return or refund my money saying "this is not a walmart item" even though I ordered it from the Walmart web site. This was deceptive, the old bait and switch. I hope to never order online from Walmart again, and plan to urge others not to.

reviews.title: Beware When Shopping On-Line at WalMart
reviews.review_text: Jacket was sold as a men's size 3X but was more a size men's Med. I did not return it because it would have cost more to return it. I gave it to someone who could wear it. This is the 3rd time I have ordered on-line from WalMart and gotten wrong sizes and/or defective clothes.

reviews.title: Unhappy Grand mother who lives 16 hrs. away
reviews.review_text: I sent this to my grandson who wears men's small but this didn't fit at all the arm length was way to short and didn't fit anykind of way. My daughter tried to return it for larger store to walmart where they live and they would not allow her to reorder a new one . And the jeans I sent was the same with the opposite problem, they were too big and did not have them in store .So my gradso has no jacket and only one pair of jeans because your sale price wouldn't cover cost of any jeans in your store. Info is needed to be printed on your web page so the public is aware of incorrect sizing.

reviews.title: Never Buy Clothes Online
reviews.review_text: imcorrect size, the size listed on the tag isnt the size you get. they run netween one amd teo sozes too small. again the jassle of waitong a month to possibly get a return after spendi6jouts between walmart com support and the local stores make it a waste of time. stick to dold and shipped by walmart.com or go-to your local store

reviews.title: Way to small too even begin to write a fair review
reviews.review_text: The price of this jacket was extremely fair but it was so untrue to size that it is not even usable. I am wearing a 3x polo shirt bought at walmart and it fits loose and is very comfortable. This jacket is so small I cannot even get it on let alone zip it up and the pockets are so small I can only put in 4 fingers and not my whole hand.

reviews.title: Be cautious when using Walmart's Market Place
reviews.review_text: This was the worst experience I've had. I ordered two different coats, waited over 2 months, I had to call Walmart and have then reach out to the vendor. We got this coat but we did not receive the second one. Their response was just to refund it. I needed the coat, waited 2 months and the answer was refund, no sorry for the inconvenience, nothing, refund it!! While I realize it was not Walmart's fault, it's their Market Place... Their lack of care or concern has led me to believe, I should not to order again from Walmart's market place!

reviews.title: Nice, fleece-lined Jacket
reviews.review_text: The jackets run VERY SMALL! That being said, Unfortunately, they are not as comfortable as I had hoped! Plus, in FL, You need to be able to wear layers, and since they run small, if you wear layers underneath, it is VERY UNCOMFORTABLE! Otherwise it is a GREAT Buy!!

reviews.title: Mens Cardigan
reviews.review_text: Ordered a 3xl, this is more like a 1xl. The person I ordered this for can not wear it as it is small. Im not sure how warm it is gonna be. You can see through if held up to light. One feature I do like is the lined sleeves and the value, but other than that, thats about it.

reviews.title: Not quality
reviews.review_text: The jacket is very thin and doesn't have much weather resistance. And the filling gets all over clothing and hair.

reviews.title: A really nice jacket!
reviews.review_text: A really well made and super soft inside jacket. The color is excellent and the sizing is spot on. 100% satisfied!
This jacket is so soft and zips well. It is light weight and will be perfect for days that are a little bit to cool.

Very disappointed with the packaging. The product arrived unfolded, with clear signs of prior use. It looked like it was hastily repackaged without any effort to fold it properly or remove visible fold marks.

Came from over-seas. Ordered an XL and when received size stated XL but was too small. Fabric felt very cheap and did not feel comfortable. Very thin. I do NOT recommend this product, it is not worth it.

reviews.title: Not the best fit!
reviews.review_text: If this is considered "plus size", I can't imagine who a regular size would fit. I purchased for my husband (weight around 180 lbs. but will be giving it to my 15 year old grandson.
Nice jacket. I was hoping it to be a bit heavier/thicker. I would say its a medium weight jacket. However, he says it does keep him warm enough. Material seems to be good all around and well-made.
Ordered a 3xl so it would be larger. Fits more like a medium. Sweater is see through in some places with fluff falling out everywhere. Took 3 weeks to ship/deliver.

This item comes from over seas somewhere. The quality sucks and is very flimsy. I ordered various sizes but for family members but none will fit. And paying $10 for shipping on each item is not cool when they all come in the same package.

My grandson loves it, says is warm and. not restricting, wears it to school when weather gets cold. We live in florida and if weather warms up jacket is easy to fold and put in backpack. Would recommend.

reviews.title: good jacket runs small
reviews.review_text: liked this jacket ordered a size larger than normal because the size needed was soldout. It is a good thing cause it just fits.

reviews.title: jacket runs very small
reviews.review_text: it is a very nice jacket however it runs about two sizes too small was very disappointed in that and the fact that it took an extra two weeks to get to me only to be too small
This runs very small. The 3x is like a X-Large. I thought they would be a little heavier. Gave them to people that could wear them. They seamed to like them. Had to buy something else for others.

I never received my two jackets that I ordered yet you keep asking me how did I like it how would I rate them. where is my order? I need those jackets it's I got bronchitis without having any big warm to wear.
Not exactly what I expected but my husband likes it so that's important to me and it's warm sort of irregular in size to snug but hey can't win them all

reviews.title: Definitely not plush
reviews.review_text: This was on sale at a reduced price and I see why. It's very very thin even though it's 'warm plush'. Would definitely not use the word plush for this. You get what you pay for and I liked the color. Reduced price means not bothering to return.

the picture gave me the impression that it was thicker, like a good heavy sweater, but no it was more like a very, very light sweater. If you expect it to keep you warm you need to add thermal underwear as well.
The jacket runs a little small. The color is a very muddy gray and less attractive than the pic showed. But otherwise, it's warm and good over jeans and a t-shirt.

Never recd This is third time I'm telling this story it was delayed two or three times at least and no jacket yet orig order was placed back in Dec Enough already send / ship/ or deliver to my door already

the product said it was 3x and I ordered two and if it was a 3X it was a 3xm babies because it was a child size jacket and it was supposed to be 3x in men it's not true to size and the product you don't get what it is in the picture

reviews.title: Jacket
reviews.review_text: Nice jacket but it was a 3x that was the size of a small or medium. I ordered for my husband but had to give it to my 11 year old grandson. It fit him perfectly.

reviews.title: Hoodie
reviews.review_text: Item was nice, and soft but to be labeled as a men's jacket not true to size. Sleeves were way too short! I was disappointed with the fit when I gave this to my grown son! It looked like a teenagers jacket!

reviews.title: Save Your Money
reviews.review_text: I ordered a 2xl and it looked to be a size medium. The inside of the hoodie portion was not 1 piece of material as shown in the picture. The seam running down the middle of the inside of the hoodie looks cheap.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: Lenago trench coat runs smaller than the size order. I ordered an extra large and it fits like a large. The quality of the product is disappointing because made with thin material and wool lining.

Exactly what is advertised! I bought 4 because they were cheap, but didnt expect much. They are great quality, size is spot on and theyre cheap! my son uses them everyday to work in the shop, split wood or other physical jobs and theyve held up with no issues after 2 months, still going strong!

reviews.title: Cheap
reviews.review_text: Photo doesn't accurately show. It isn't like a fleece lined jacket. The fabric has a fleece backing and all of the stitching shows through the fleece making the jacket thinner and cheap looking. Fleece lining is a cheap, yellow color. Nothing like photo.

reviews.title: Low quality and wrong size for a man.
reviews.review_text: I ordered a Mens XL. The item I received was a ladys Jacket. It is way too small to be a Mens XL, plus the zipper pull in on the left side which is where a ladies jacket would have it. The quality is terrible. I am a Walmart customer and they will not refund the shipping. I will not be renewing my membership.

reviews.title: Hoodie
reviews.review_text: The only thing I dislike about this hoodie is the zipper. 90% of the time it doesn't zip up at all. When you do get it to zip it's a fight that it doesn't separate. It isn't just me because I have had others try to zip it and they had the same problem. I suppose it's because they used plastic zippers.

very disappointed in this item. I ordered two of these because the price was very good. I ordered two 3x large in size. when they arrived I could barely put them on. they were very tight on me which made me think they were nothing more than a medium at most. trying to squeeze a 3X guy into a medium is impossible. I ended up giving the items to my bride who is very small and she was able to wear them. very disappointed in these items.

reviews.title: Not Good
reviews.review_text: Ongoing problem with sizing from non-US suppliers. Sizing runs dramatically smaller and 3rd party venders are less than helpful. Only upside is that I am donating to local charity at my expense. This item shipped directly from china to my home - Walmart did not share this during purchase. Very dissatisfied

reviews.title: Don't bother
reviews.review_text: Cheap thin polyester - size not even close to being correct - JUNK

reviews.title: Can't wait for fall
reviews.review_text: Great product for a great price
the hood was too small for a large and the pockets were small couldn't hold my phone

reviews.title: My Jacket
reviews.review_text: My grandson love the jacket thank you very much much Bonnie Hunter Erie P A
A VERY NICE HOODIE; I SHOULD HAVE GOT AN XL AS IT SEEMED TIGHT FITTING-MY WIFE GOT HERSELF A 'NEW' HOODIE......
It runs small and it shrunk miserably when washed in cold water!!! That is probably why it was on sale for so cheep!

reviews.title: Too small
reviews.review_text: I ordered the 2xl but it fits more like a medium or large. I gave it to my mom and sister since I had ordered 2. It would be warm.
Sizes ran 2-3 sizes smaller. I ended up using them for Christmas gifts. The people who received them, love them. Said they are extremely warm.
it's a great jacket. It's just not the size it says it is. And the zipper has issues sometimes as well.

reviews.title: runs on very small side
reviews.review_text: very soft and comfortable and warm. just wish it was right size. bought it 3 sizes to big but my boobs still don't fit
Bought for my son as a gift. It was everything I needed it to be
I ordered a man's coat, and received a female's coat ðŸ§¥!!!!!!
The size is not matching. If you order you must order a bigger size than usual.

reviews.title: Fits a little snug
reviews.review_text: Fits a little snug, love the color and the texture

reviews.title: Keep scrolling
reviews.review_text: This item is cheap and they say it's a man's but it isn't it's a woman's wouldn't recommend it . This item is so great I sent it back

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: It kept getting pushed back on delivery, it's ridiculously too small, however it was 5.99 so live in learn.
i bought two of these for my fiancÃ©e and myself and they're smaller than what is described and i already got a hole in mine.
ordered a 2x for my 30 yr old son and this barely fit my 12 yr old. if you buy this make sure to order at least sizes bigger.

reviews.title: Runs wayy to small.
reviews.review_text: I bought this men's winter coat 3x. it's big enough to fit my 7 year old son. I can't even fit it I'm 5 5 160 lb

reviews.title: Great value(no pun intended)for the $
reviews.review_text: Very comfy %26 fits,looks great just as pictured.Only thing I don't like is that the zipper is on the opposite side of what I am used to.
This jacket runs on the small side. I was hoping for a roomier fit. The price was good. It's an okay jacket.

reviews.title: It doesn't fit
reviews.review_text: This jacket will keep you warm but it runs small. I ordered an XL and I can't even close it to zip it up. I always get XL in jackets.

reviews.title: I don't recommend
reviews.review_text: Sweater runs too small. I ordered a XL and fits mor like a medium. the hood is too small to wear or just looks funny when on.
wasnt thick like it looked and the size was off i bought one at store the same size it was great but the one i ordered was probably 2 sizes to small
They are made very small won't fit for the person I bought them for..Had to give to a smaller person

reviews.title: Not even close to right sizing
reviews.review_text: ordered a 3X and it is marked a 3X, but it's half that size, more like a large. ordered 2 and both were way way to small
The jacket was suppose to be and is labeled as 3 xl. But the only one it will fit is my son in law and he is a xl.
It has a bad texture. The inside is nice and soft but the outer layer feels like plastic. It also runs small.
It is cheaply made. It's supposed to be a 3XL and it's barely an Excel. It is cheaply made. It's supposed to be a 3XL and it's barely N XL.
Cheap quality, NOT true to size. i ordered a 3x men's, it was a men's large. i returned the item and NEVER got my money back.
it was not at all as thick as I expected. but for $10 I guess i shouldn't have expected too much and the 3x fit like a 1x.
WOW!!!! INCREDIBLE Quality especially for the price. Comfy %26 Warm has become a much loved treasured friend. Sad it was a clearance item

reviews.title: Too small, returned.
reviews.review_text: Bought a 3x for my son and he couldn't get the sleeves over a long sleeve tshirt because they were so small.

reviews.title: 3x not the right size more like a large size.
reviews.review_text: Figure out why people can't be honest about the things that they are selling that way it will give others a chance to get some ware out of their jackets I bought4 of them I can't wear it, but my daughter can. Just be honest

reviews.title: Don't buy, not worth it
reviews.review_text: Ordered a 3x and it fits like a size large. It has a very cheap zipper that is going to fall off after the first wash and wear. The string for the hoodie already came out.

reviews.title: Good coat but size is off
reviews.review_text: The quality is surprisingly good, but is too tight. I wear a medium to large, and ordered an XXL. This too small. I should have ordered the largest size.

reviews.title: Bought 4 and would buy again
reviews.review_text: amazing price. good quality. size is spot on. colors are very pretty. inside lining is really soft. The outside is good, but not as durable as id like. they're perfect for casual wear, but not durable for farm work. i bought 4 and would buy again.
It isn't a heavy winter sweatshirt. I have light sweaters warmer than this. Its fine for in the house if you add a couple layers.. More for decoration than warmth.

reviews.title: Not worth the wait
reviews.review_text: The material of the sweatshirt is thinner than expected. Some of the seam stitching is uneven, which has some seams come undone. The overall package was delayed twice, and I did not know it was coming from Hong Kong,
although the bag stated size 3x the size I ordered but the actual tag on the jacket stated size 2x. I had to purchase another jacket from another store.
If that is a 3xl,I'm a girl.I could barely get my arms in the sleeves and it was very tight across the shoulders. Could not zip closed either. What should I have expected from something that cheap.

shipment was great the only problem I had with this product was it ran a little bit small and it was a woman's as many times as it says man on the description the zipper was on the left side which is a lady

reviews.title: Great coat for the $$$$$
reviews.review_text: Runs small. Nice coat. Zipper is on the left. Not a problem for me, but have heard some people complain. If that is the reason you don't like it. GET A LIFE!!!

These run extremely small. My son that wears a medium was the only one that could wear the XL and it still looked a little tight....it is made of material that seems to shed even after multiple washes.

reviews.title: sweater
reviews.review_text: i normally shop pro club. thise sizes are ture to fit my size. over 230 and like 5'9. i ordered a 3XL and it felt like a LG. even on my son the wears a LG it looked small on him. but very soft comfortable warm and great price
The inside of the jacket shreds a lot add to watch many times

reviews.title: Fits way too small
reviews.review_text: Jacket is supposed to be a XXXL it fits like a large.

reviews.title: Smelled
reviews.review_text: Item smelled so bad. Gave it a bad rating because of this.
i still haven't received replacement since it was delivered to the wrong address
it's a really nice jacket, but order at least 1-2 sizes bigger

I didn't get the color I ordered and because it came from China didn't know how to get it replaced

The product was so cheaply made Don't get that product
Not as pictured. Inside shows seams . Thin material.
it was a mens 3x n it was very small and tight. and it came with a hole in the pocket..
It wouldn't have fit a small boy ,very dissatisfied
the material is no good for me annd run too small for the sise

reviews.title: Comfortable
reviews.review_text: am wondering if it will indure a season?

reviews.title: too small
reviews.review_text: the jacket is too small and can't get your hands in the pockets.

reviews.review_text: Does not run true to size purchased 3xl way smaller.
Was way too small! Looked like a boys size not a man's
do not order the jacket cuz you order it large it looks like it's small and tight
Bought it for a friend for Christmas..He says the fit is great and that it is very warm..
the coats are not what they led up to be they are not size right it took too long to get it to us

reviews.title: Not what you expect.
reviews.review_text: The size chart was not rite . Ordered 3x it was very tight. Nice and warm, when there is no wind.

reviews.title: cheaply made
reviews.review_text: too cheap not even the quality i expected.
Once again Chinese sizing makes ordering your size extremely difficult
I ordered men's size and it came in women's size with zipper on the wrong side
it runs real small, ordered a 3x and its more like xl

reviews.title: very disappointed in jacket
reviews.review_text: suppose to be a mens plus 3x and it fits like a mens small
tht size is smaller than normal. the inside lining is ok, its just too fuzzy. order one size up

nice coat, knew it would be cheap, but works. for my son. long zipper hope it holds up

reviews.review_text: I love it its warm and comfortable and a perfect fit

reviews.review_text: The hoodie was just what my grandson wanted. He loved it. It's nice and warm.
